task:
Login to LinkedIn and navigate to profile:
1. Use navigate action to go to https://www.linkedin.com/login
2. Fill email field with {email} from sensitive_data
3. Fill password field with {password} from sensitive_data
4. Click Sign in button
5. Wait 5 seconds for page to load
6. Click the Me button in top navigation
7. Click View Profile in dropdown menu
8. Wait 3 seconds for profile to load
9. Scroll down to load all sections
10. Use done action when complete
